lines.setup: Riker strides into the party room. He catches the eye of a tall brunette and flashes her a smile. She's interested, he can tell. 'I'll bring her a drink,' he decides.
lines.anticipating_replicator_creation: raises his eyebrows at the serving plate
lines.move_on_to_next_episode: Congratulations! You may now move on to the next episode.
lines.responding_to_nothing_on_replicator_plat: Where's my ale? I don't see anything.
lines.fix_replicator_request: Fix this drink. And make it quick!
